sent.orig: The P in cupboard has been lost by assimilation to b.
sent.trans: cupboard 中的P因受b的同化而不发音。

sent.orig: There will be plenty of room in that cupboard when it is cleared out.
sent.trans: 把东西都出空后，碗橱里边的地位可大着呢。

sent.orig: She followed me everywhere, but it's only a cupboard love-she wanted money.
sent.trans: 我到哪里她就跟到哪里，但她所表示的这种亲热不过是另有所图而以－她要的是钱。

sent.orig: If you have some skeletons in your cupboard it's time clear them out.
sent.trans: 如果你有什么不可告人的秘密，你还是应该把它们都说出来。

sent.orig: I open my cupboard and select a G&T-style dress to wear.
sent.trans: 我打开衣柜，想挑一件智识型的衣服来穿。
